newsitem.title: UK: INSIGHT-FTSE may ease to 4,590 after defiant start.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT-FTSE may ease to 4,590 after defiant start.

text.p: The FTSE 100 index may strengthen to about 4,620 in early trading on Tuesday, but could then succumb to selling pressure and hobble down to 4,590, technical analysts said.

Investors are beginning to show a diminishing appetite for shares following four days of trying to keep the index above 4,625, but concerns over Wednesday's budget will dominate proceedings so that a soft tone will emerge as the day wears on, they added.
By 0720 GMT, at the pre-market open the FTSE was indicated up 6.6 at 4,611.2.
